attributes.action: Hold a referendum vote on the Ukraine war
attributes.additional_details: The U.K. government needs to listen to the U.K. citizens if we have a referendum whether we want to be taken into conflict with Russia. we havent seen any improvement so far to end any conflict between Ukraine and  Russia. Lives are lost on both sides this must end now!
attributes.background: U.K.citizens should have the right to vote to have a say whether they would or not have any involvement in the Ukraine conflict.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Hold a referendum on continued UK support for Ukraine
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702489
